content: with this pattern you can crochet a beautiful bear lovey / security blanket / comforter / snuggle which is going to be loved by your little one it is both soft toy and a blanket/ comforter two in one really toy to play with and a comforter to sleep with the blanket measures 23 / 60 cm when laid flat on the floor from large *v* point to *v* point skill level easy yarn aran / worsted hooks 3 00mm or 3 50mm and 5 00mm this is a 15 pages crochet pattern beautifully illustrated with clear easy to follow page by page details written in english using us terminology there is a crochet conversion chart uk/us for you to use the correct stitches if you have any questions about the pattern please feel free to contact me thank you for your visit
